#include <bits/stdc++.h>
	using namespace std;
	#define md 1000000007
	#define lli long long int
 
	lli a[27];
	//lli dp[27][100005];
 
	void pre()
	{
		int i;
		a[0] = 1;
		a[1] = 2;
		for ( int i = 2; i <= 26; i++ ) a[i] = a[i-1] + a[i-2];
		return;
	}
 
	lli dp[100005];
	void func(int n, int k)
	{
   		int i,j,t;
   		//memset(dp, 0, sizeof(dp));
   		dp[0] = 1;
   		for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ ) {
       		for ( j = a[i]; j <= k; j++ ) {
          	 	dp[j] = (dp[j]+dp[j-a[i]])%md;
       		}
   		}   	
	}
	int main()
	{
 
		lli n,k,t;
		cin>>t;
		pre();
		func(27,100004);
		//memset(dp, -1, sizeof(dp));
		while(t--){
			cin>>n>>k;
			long long int ans1,ans2;
			ans1 = dp[n]%md;
			ans2 = dp[n-k]%md;
			ans1 = (ans1-ans2)%md;
			while ( ans1 < 0 ) ans1 += md;
			cout << ans1 << endl;
		}
		return 0;
	}
